lexUnit.name: tremendous.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: extremely good or impressive; excellent.

sentence.text: The non-practitioners have been absolutely tremendous .
People have been tremendous with sponsorship .
The possibility was there for a tremendous finish .
The Scottish forwards were in tremendous form , cleaning up at the line-out and generally demolishing a big , strong Country pack .
The international manager wants to take full advantage of Hughes ' tremendous form at the moment .
Golf 's leading TV commentator and raconteur was in tremendous form as he led his team of former Ryder Cuppers to victory over the former Walker Cuppers in The Grand Match at Deal .
But , in a tremendous game that thoroughly entertained the big crowd , Garryowen played a storm .
` Andre has done a tremendous job , explaining in great detail what happens when someone dies and when they are cremated .
` The state oil company , PDVSA , has done a tremendous job since nationalisation and is now ranked among the largest and best in the world , " he says .
After the rescue , Mr Darling , a former editor of the Evening Gazette in Middlesbrough , said : ` The crew did a tremendous job . "
The breed in Sweden was off to a tremendous start and from this position of strength , Swedish people have produced over the years some very good Rottweilers .
Saddlers manager Kenny Hibbitt said : ` I always knew he had quality and he 's made a tremendous start to his career . "
PETER Scudamore 's neighbour Nigel Twiston-Davies has got off to a tremendous start this season with 24 wins in the bag already .
This is a tremendous response in so short a time .

The views are still tremendous in the Lakes , but sitting down to be surrounded by two or three belligerent sheep whose main occupation in life is to steal my cheese and pickle sandwich is about the best way of spoiling a good day out .
` He was tremendous against Mark Wright -- and when you consider he 's as good a centre-half as any , you just know Deano need fear no-one .
She is still a bit shy but she 's tremendous with me .
It is a tremendous achievement for the twenty-nine people of the department who all contributed towards the donation .
` It 's a tremendous country , with friendly people and little of the hassle you get elsewhere in Africa .
The response was tremendous ; the reaction incredibly enthusiastic , and so from that point , it became a little more than a folk club .
But the lads have been tremendous , and there 's a buzz around the club now all we want now is for them to show the same attitude tonight . "
He had a tremendous first session .
` It 's tremendous to work with such a talented team of photographers on the SMH .
Enjoy your Christmas heartily , and here 's to a truly tremendous 1992 .
